DOC.brief_summary: This trial is conducted in South America. This aim of this trial is to evaluate the comparative prandial blood glucose lowering profile in subjects with type 1 diabetes.
DOC.brief_title: Human Insulin NPH and Insulin Aspart in Type 1 Diabetes
DOC.mesh_term: Insulin degludec, insulin aspart drug combination
DOC.criteria: Type 1 diabetes for at least 12 months Treatment with insulin NPH Body Mass Index (BMI) below 30 kg/m2 Total daily insulin dose greater than 1.40 IU/kg Treatment with oral antidiabetic drugs (OADs)
